mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FORM_VARIANT ( F_VARIANT_ID, F_OWNER_FORM_ID, F_WIDTH, F_HEIGHT, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ variantId }, #{ ownerFormId }, #{ width }, #{ height }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FORM_VARIANT SET F_OWNER_FORM_ID = #{ ownerFormId }, F_WIDTH = #{ width }, F_HEIGHT = #{ height }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_VARIANT_ID = #{ variantId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_VARIANT_ID AS "variantId", T1.F_OWNER_FORM_ID AS "ownerFormId", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_NAME AS "owner_title" FROM T_FORM_VARIANT T1 LEFT JOIN T_FORM T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_FORM_ID = T2.F_FORM_ID WHERE T1.F_VARIANT_ID = #{ variantId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FORM_VARIANT T1

SELECT T1.F_FORM_ID AS "formId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_NAME AS "name", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_FORM T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_FORM_ID = #{ ownerFormId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FORM T1
